PUMS bulk summary statistics

pums_bulk_stat.Rd

Generate a statistic separately for a list of grouping variables List input items can be multiple, i.e. character vector

Usage

pums_bulk_stat(
  so,
  stat_type,
  stat_var = NULL,
  group_var_list,
  incl_na = TRUE,
  rr = FALSE
)

Arguments

so

The srvyr object returned by get_psrc_pums

stat_type

Desired survey statistic

stat_var

The numeric variable to summarize

group_var_list

List with each list item a grouping variable or set of grouping variables

incl_na

option to remove NA from group_vars (if FALSE, the total may not reflect the full dataset)

rr

optional relative reliability column, i.e. coefficient of variation as category levels (breakpoints: .15/.3./.5 -> good/fair/weak/unreliable)

Value

A table with the variable names and labels, summary statistic and margin of error

Author

Michael Jensen
